Title: Personal Assistance Suite (PAS)
Description: This C# project aims to set up a modular Rich Client Platform (RCP). Microsoft Prism Library 5.0 for WPF is used to implement this modularity.
HomeWiki:
This project is currently only a playground to help me become familiar with Prism.
 
The Personal Assistance Suite (PAS) project aims to set up a modular Rich Client Plattform (RCP) for private use.
 
  • Microsoft Prism Library 5.0 for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) is used to implement this modularity.
  • It is written in C# and uses the .NET Framework 4.5.1
  • The graphical user interface (GUI) is based on the .NET 4.5 integrated Microsoft Ribbon for WPF
